---
title: "Usage"
---

## Description

You want to see how people are interacting with your content.
This can be useful to show who is viewing your content, how frequently they are viewing it, when they view it, and other information.

## Recipe: Find usage

::: {.panel-tabset group="language"}

## Python

```{.python}
usage = client.metrics.usage.find()
```
